title: 3. Pediatrician + Calendly
desc: Contains the full content for the Pediatrician demo plus the Calendly online bookings implementation ( no plugin needed for that ). Note that you should install Contact Forms 7 plugin first.

[vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_padding" elevate="elevate" background="transparent" el_class="folded_section"][vc_column width="1/4" color_set="skincolored_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Well baby Visits" subtitle="The cornerstone of child care" teaser_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fservices%23wellbaby||" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="wmi icon-i-nursery" button_style="btn-secondary"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" color_set="secondary_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="General Paediatrics" subtitle="From infants to adolescence " teaser_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fservices%23generalpediatrics||" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="wmi icon-i-pediatrics" button_style="btn-primary"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" color_set="dark_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Allergies" subtitle="Specialized treatment" teaser_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fservices%23allergies||" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="wmi icon-i-nutrition" button_style="btn-secondary"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" color_set="black_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Request an Appointment" subtitle="Let's schedule your visit!" teaser_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fappointments%2F||" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-calendar" button_style="btn-primary"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_top_padding" particles="0"][vc_column width="2/3" heading_align="text-center" align="text-left" margin="margin_bottom_grid"][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="An innovative pediatric practice that cares for families one child at a time." align="text-left"]

Keeping children Happy & Healthy!

[/plethora_headinggroup][vc_column_text]Pediatricians specialize in the care of infants, children, and adolescents. Pediatricians provide a range of services from well-child care, to basic childhood immunizations and illnesses, to managing complex medical conditions and chronic disorders. The use of one electronic medical record for each patient ensures constant and timely communication between your child’s entire medical team.[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="MODERN MEDICAL FACILITIES" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black"][vc_column_text]I provide comprehensive care for infants, children and adolescents. Whether supporting a teen through chemotherapy treatments or treating a toddler in an emergency, we are dedicated to the care of each patient. Our mission is to protect the health of our community's most valuable resource – its children.[/vc_column_text][plethora_button button_text="Checkout all Pediatric Services" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fservices%2F||" button_style="btn-primary" button_with_icon="with-icon" button_icon="wmi icon-i-pediatrics" button_icon_align="icon-left"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" align="text-left"][plethora_teaserbox title="Dr. Olivia Childcare" subtitle="Pediatric Private Practice" teaser_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fthe-doctor%2F||" image="131" media_ratio="stretchy_wrapper ratio_1-1" text_colorset="skincolored_section" text_boxed_styling="boxed" button_text="About me" button="1"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_set="light_section" full_width="0" full_height="0" sep_top="separator_top sep_angled_positive_top" sep_bottom="separator_bottom sep_angled_positive_bottom" particles="0"][vc_column][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="My private practice is specially designed to help kids feel like home." align="text-left"]

In a children-friendly environment!

[/plethora_headinggroup][/vc_column][vc_column heading_align="text-center" align="text-left" margin="margin_bottom_grid" offset="vc_col-md-8"][vc_media_grid element_width="6" initial_loading_animation="none" grid_id="vc_gid:1467793694821-aee68aa6-66a0-9" include="126,127,128,129"][/vc_column][vc_column align="text-left" offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_text_separator title="Working Hours" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black" el_class="x_bold"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_text_separator title="Fees & Insurance" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black" el_class="x_bold"][vc_column_text]Dr. Olivia provides direct insurance billing with all the major international insurance providers and assistance companies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_set="secondary_section" align="text-center" full_width="0" full_height="0" cols_valign="vcenter" transparent_overlay="transparent_film" background="bgimage" bgimage="123" parallax="0"][vc_column align="text-center"][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="Call Now (600) 123-4567 to schedule your next appointment!"]

Have you planned your next well-baby visit?

[/plethora_headinggroup][plethora_button button_text="Request an Appointment" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fplethorathemes.com%2Fhealthflex%2Fpediatrician%2Fappointments%2F||" button_align="text-center" button_style="btn-success" button_with_icon="with-icon" button_icon="fa fa-check" button_icon_align="icon-left"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Let's make it fun and exciting for children to come to the pediatrician’s office.

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="Appointment Request" title_align="separator_align_left"][vc_column_text]If you wish to book an appointment with a doctor, it is best that you visit the Appointment Booking Page directly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_top_padding" sep_top="separator_top sep_angled_positive_top" sep_bottom="separator_bottom sep_angled_positive_bottom" particles="0" css=".vc_custom_1467278990971{padding-bottom: 64px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" color_set="skincolored_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Parking Spaces" subtitle="You can park your car just outside" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-car" button="0"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" color_set="secondary_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Bus Routes" subtitle="Bus nr.23 leaves you just in front" boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="fa fa-bus" button="0"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" color_set="dark_section"][plethora_teaserbox title="Accesibility" subtitle="We use ramps for easier access." boxed_styling="boxed" media_type="icon" icon="wmi icon-i-accessibility" button="0"][/plethora_teaserbox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_set="dark_section" align="text-center" full_width="0" full_height="0" transparent_overlay="transparent_film" background="bgimage" bgimage="60" parallax="0"][vc_column][plethora_headinggroup subtitle="subscribe to our awesome mailchimp.com list"]

page.post_content: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2" color_set="light_section" boxed="boxed_plus"][contact-form-7 id="110"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][plethora_fixedmedia image="99"][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]This form is created using the "Contact Form 7" WordPress Plugin. It is meant to send an email to the doctor's office and the doctor will have to reply to the patient and confirm or change the dates. Alternatively,  you can use a Booking Plugin or an external SASS application to book appointments directly online! Visit this page for an example with Calendly![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

ple-page-subtitle-text: Fill in the form to request an a appointment!

page.post_content: [vc_row][vc_column margin="margin_bottom_grid"][vc_toggle title="Emergency information" el_id="1447064341323-f6ee47d8-32bf"]If you are an emergency case requiring immediate attention, please call (+555) 959-595-959 or the nurse at (+555) 959-595-959. We will give you instructions and directions. If you know the Medical Centre' s address, please come as quick as possible. If you need transfer by us, please let us know by phone.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What can I expect at an appointment?" el_id="1447064412741-3e356338-032d"]When you arrive at the Medical Centre, the staff will greet you and seat you at the waiting room. We will examine you as quick as possible - average waiting time is 15 minutes.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What happens if I am a new patient?" el_id="1447064451796-0645cbf1-8947"]You may have referred yourself, have been referred by another specialist or by Medical Insurance. We will discuss your problem and ask about your medical history. A thorough examination will then follow. We may request examinations and tests to assist and support our diagnosis. X-rays, blood / urine analysis, ultrasonography, MRI, endoscopy can all be performed with no delay in the same building. If you have previous examinations and tests related to your current condition, please bring those along to the consultation. Also bring any copies of letters from other doctors or recent medication. It will help us to help you. We will discuss with you the results of your examinations and we will recommend the proper treatment. Some conditions may be faced immediately by conservative or surgical treatment. In case you need surgery requiring general anesthesia, we arrange routine or urgent transfer by quick boat, state or private air ambulance to Athens or to your preferred destination (subject to stable medical condition). In special cases a patient can be escorted. Otherwise, depending on the results of your examinations, the nature of the medical problem and your holiday plan, we will discharge you from our clinic, refer you on to another health professional or book you for surgery. If follow-up consultation or further consultations are required, we will indicate this and the staff will let you know the date and time of your next appointment.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Do you have Imaging (x-rays, ultrasonography, CT-scan) facilities?" el_id="1447064507869-5e4ee3bd-a327"]Yes. Ordinary x-rays, panoramic mouth views, ultrasonography , endoscopy, CT-scan, bone mass density scanner or laser imager ( digital developer ) can be performed on location.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Do you examine children at your clinic?" el_id="1447064555113-315c72fb-176e"]Yes. A Pediatrician is immediately available if needed. [/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What happens if I need an intramuscular or intravenous injection?" el_id="1447065558213-dca24fc1-47a1"]Certain cases require injections for quick and full recovery. These can include antibiotics, anti-inflammators, local anesthesia or steroids. Steroids and local anesthesia injections are administered by Doctors and anti-inflammators / antibiotics by an experienced nurse under our supervision.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What if I need Anesthetic?" el_id="1447065583979-54e0b9c1-ae47"]We can undertake only small or minor procedures in our Medical Centre, using local anesthesia or superficial sedation. All other procedures requiring general anesthesia are transferred to Athens or back to patient's destination, to be admitted at a General Hospital.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What happens if I need a prescription?" el_id="1447065607650-fbb48814-35d7"]We may prescribe for example analgesia treatment for your condition. Please let us know in case you have any allergy or other medical condition. If you have already been taking drugs prescribed by your home doctor, please bring them with you for clarification or possible drug interactions and correlations with the new condition.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Insurance and Billing" el_id="1447065636406-978b4ed0-e711"]Do you accept my insurance? Our Medical Centre accepts most of the internationally recognized Insurance companies with affiliate. If this is not your case, or if you have no insurance coverage then you will be expected to pay the bill in cash or credit card at the end of consultation. The original receipt, the signed copy of the credit card bill, the medical report in English and the results of tests performed are given to you in order to be delivered to your private or state insurance for reimbursement. An estimate of consultation fees and costs, investigations or surgery are available on request. Do I need referral? If you have private insurance with an affiliate, the referral can be sent from your insurance company to us by fax or e-mail. We suggest that you contact your insurance in order to obtain this referral before your visit to our offices. If you don't have an insurance coverage, feel free to come to our Medical Centre. The billing procedure is as explained above.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Do you have parking facilities?" el_id="1447065710387-d413605d-104e"]Yes. Free Parking is available in front and around the Medical Centre.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column margin="margin_bottom_grid"][vc_column_text]

Forms requiring completion

You are expected to complete and submit the following forms:
  • Form -- for all new students, and students submit online, or parents/guardians can submit with their student's log-in
  • Another Form (PDF) -- only for students under the age of 18, and your parent or guardian must complete this form;

Health care on site

Health Service (HS) can provide most of your health care while you are. People pay a health service fee (included as part of tuition) which covers many services.  For who and what is covered, see Fees for People. HS services are available by appointment, although help for urgent problems is available, and you can call HS day or night if you need medical advice. To learn more about health care, see the Guide to Health Care (PDF). For easy access, please put these HS numbers in your phone:
  • (675) 743-8570 -- call when HS is open
  • (998) 235-1028 -- call for advice when HS is closed

Insurance

Consider purchasing Insurance, which significantly reduces financial loss if you are unable to complete due to physical or psychological illness. For about the price of a textbook, you can protect your financial investment for the entire year.

Prescriptions

Arrange for prescription renewals and/or a supply of medications to bring. Contact the Pharmacy (432-574-7217) regarding transferring prescriptions. We want to be your pharmacy of choice. If you take ADD/ADHD medications, plan ahead. On stable regimens may renew prescriptions by visiting a HS physician and bringing the following to the first visit:
  1. Documentation of diagnosis of ADD/ADHD and
  2. Documentation of current management plans for ADD/ADHD
If you wear glasses or contact lenses, bring a copy of your current prescription, in case replacement is needed. You can get eye exams, contact lenses and glasses at the HS Eye Care Clinic and Optical Shop. If you take allergy shots, arrange to bring antigen and continue shots at HS. HS must review and approve all treatment programs.See Allergy Services or call.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]This online booking page, uses an external service called Calendly. You can set-up your schedule by signing up on their service and then embed the booking application to your page in WordPress![/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]

ple-page-subtitle-text: Online, direct appointment scheduling and booking, using Calendly!

page.post_content:
[vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" sep_bottom="separator_bottom sep_angled_positive_bottom" particles="0" css=".vc_custom_1467271025601{padding-top: 64px !important;padding-bottom: 64px !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]In my private cleanse intensive, you will be stepping into your new, clean life – and you’ll walk away with all of the tools to maintain it. Once you schedule a 60 minute cleanse consultation, you and I will meet in-person, over the phone, or via Skype to get to know each other and gain an understanding of your lifestyle, and the nutrients that will be unique to you in transforming your body. After our initial meeting, you’ll be sent a personalized meal plan including the best recipes I’ve come up with through years of research and experimenting.
